mapper.select: SELECT c.* FROM Contents c LEFT JOIN Relationships r ON c.id = r.Cid LEFT JOIN Metas m ON r.Mid = m.Id WHERE m.`Name` = #{name} AND m.Type = #{type} AND m.Deleted = 0 AND c.Deleted = 0 ORDER BY c.Created DESC
SELECT * FROM Contents WHERE Deleted = 0 AND DATE( Created )= #{date} ORDER BY Created DESC
SELECT Id FROM Contents WHERE Created < (SELECT Created FROM Contents WHERE Id = #{id}) AND Deleted = 0 ORDER BY Created DESC LIMIT 1
SELECT Id FROM Contents WHERE Created > (SELECT Created FROM Contents WHERE Id = #{id}) AND Deleted = 0 ORDER BY Created LIMIT 1
SELECT DISTINCT DATE( Created ) AS date, Count( 1 ) AS count FROM Contents WHERE Deleted = 0 GROUP BY date ORDER BY count DESC
